    private void txtDGActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void btnKQActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
       // lay ve a,o dieu khien txtSL
        int a = Integer.parseInt(txtSL.getText());
       //lay ve b,o dieu khien txtDG
        int b = Integer.parseInt(txtDG.getText());
        int c = a*b;
       // xuat ket qua ra txtKQ
        txtKQ.setText(c+"");
    }                                     

    private void txtKQActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }
